updates.details: Registry issue now resolved after some host reboots. Quota issue persists, see previous update.

Some GWS volumes permitting writes beyond true quota and becoming full. Check mon.jasmin.ac.uk for true quota (df may report wrong value). Issue being investigated with storage vendor.
Failure of a switch during this work is currently affecting some Data Transfer Zone services, including gridftp1, hpxfer1,2, ceda ftp server and HAProxy used for object store access.

Confirmed for 8-10 October. Main visible effect will be reduced capacity in (existing) LOTUS cluster as power equipment for each rack of nodes are taken out of service for testing. Nodes in new cluster (not yet in production anyway) will be unavailable. Other services should not be affected.
